RelatedSentence: The Same - Sex Adoption Cases Playing Out In Utah While Marriage Is On Hold In December , when a federal judge ruled that Utah 's ban on same - sex marriage was unconstitutional , over 1,300 same - sex couples married before the decision was stayed by the U.S. Supreme Court .
Though marriage itself was put on hold by the stay , the fate of those 1,300+ marriages was left unclear , and a fight over their legality has continued to play out since .

In particular , several of those couples have been fighting for the right to legally adopt their own children , but a Utah Supreme Court ruling last week delayed the outcome of that struggle as well .
